Interface IsDefaultArc

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IsDefaultLine, IsDefaultPoint, IsDefaultRectangle
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Arc, DefaultArc, DefaultChartArc, DefaultChartLine, DefaultChartPoint, DefaultChartRectangle, DefaultLine, DefaultPoint, DefaultRectangle, Line, Point, Rectangle

    public interface IsDefaultArc
    Interface to define arc object defaults.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
